abilities.description: Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

description: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
tips: Very strong against heroes whose main source of damage are their right-clicks, making them unable to attack for 5 seconds.

Because the disarm displays an icon and can't be dispelled, you can use it to reveal your enemy before it uses a Manta Style or ability to create illusions. It can be very useful against Phantom Lancer.
Try to anticipate to use the disarm just before the spell immunity is used.
An Ethereal Blade can be an alternative to disarm and amplify the magic damage for a spell caster (however it can be dispelled).
attrs: Bonus +20 Strength +25 Attack damage +25% Evasion +14% Status resistance
info: For strength heroes, it grants 400 health, 2 health regen, 1.6% magic resistance and 45 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 400 health, 2 health regen, 1.6% magic resistance and 25 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 400 health, 2 health regen, 1.6% magic resistance and 25 attack damage.
The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
The status resistance stacks diminishingly with other sources of status resistance.
